column2: here's my first problem and I might be a little picky about this but I like what I like.  The menu has numbers next to the items. Ughhhh! That seems so cheesy to me. Part of the experience of going to a Tapas place is to experience the culture
column3: food and language.  So as I'm trying to pronounce the name of the dish to the waitress instead of helping me to pronounce it correctly she says to me
column5: number 44". It took all of the excitement out of imagining I was in a different country.
